commit message:
Changes:
-icon built using a higher quality source
-version number changed to YYYYMMDD format
-about activity updated with correct link to bundled icon and license information
-PollService now schedules an alarm every 5 minutes

Expanding Capabilities
-main activity now has placeholder text and icon to indicate that the service is running
-settings activity now uses sharedpreferences to read and save settings
-added red and green button pngs to indicate service status
-copyright/author headers added to .java files

Work on preferences
-using shared preferences to save settings
-settings activity reads settings correctly
-default preferences stored in DefPrefs class for now
-initial work on a preferences singleton (might not be needed

More work on preferences
-changing layout
-all checkboxes wired to sharedpreferences

Numerous Changes
About:
-license split into a subview

Preferences:
-cleaned up main preferences view to only hold a few settings
-advanced settings moved to a seperate activity
-added new preferences: bufferMinutes, wakeDevice, silenceAllDay
-cleaned up the code by moving all drawing operations to refreshDisplay()

QuickSilence:
-quick silence feature now works correctly with a toast message and notification indicator
-a bug still exists where the quick silence will cancel if the main activity is started

Icons:
-added initial icons for the quick silence notification
-added icons for the license activity
-changed icon for the about activity

Working state
-now correctly returns a list of active events
-activates correctly for busy, all day, and free time events

Bugs
-does not restore state once event ends
-service should run when settings are changed (but quick silence is not active)

1.0 release

-added CalEvent class to hold info on the active event
-activeEvent() returns a CalEvent object
-activeEvent() now correctly polls columns from the instances table instead of the Events table.  This should solve dtend returning null for recurring events
-min api level lowered to 15 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
-uses NotificationCompat.Builder to support API level 15
-license.html updated with info for the included icons
-about.html includes donate link
-PollService now correctly restores volumes when an event is finished or when the service is stopped
-notification displays the name and end time of the current event
